predictable, campy, bad special effects. it has a TV-movie feeling to it. the voices are weird--there is a weirdness to the actors' voices that gives it a strange awkwardness. as you already know, the movie is about a boy who thinks he can do anything because he can fly. this boy gets taken away by a clockwork crew that he thinks is helping him to actually fly

The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the crew are found in an area with spikes with feeding tubes going all throughout the place and into the crew member's bodies' So its not possible to save them They then come across something buried in the sand, and dig it out. To them, it looks to be some kind of sand pterodactyl.

I saw it tonight and fell asleep in the movie.

That is something that I have not done since - I have never fallen asleep at a real movie in a theater..

I regretted it too, because I knew the trailer made it look stupid..however..it is an awesome soundtrack, and Spacey is great as Victor..I liked the extended story line about his kind of betrayal..I wasn’t sure of the main character

Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie is pale by comparison to more recent Disney fairy tales, thanks to computer graphics. The biggest mistake to my point of view is a pretty traditional one, with regards to storytelling in general, in which we start at the very beginning of a fantasy era. The movie labours the impression that this world always was

What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find. The wealthy fliers have long since left Planet Earth, for adventures across the countless empires that make up the Hunting Worlds. Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is going to be criticized by some because it has very little action in the first half, and ultimately that's because it's basically a TV series pilot with the second season beginning with the fight at the biggest interval in this first episode.
